channel.title: Boundary County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Boundary County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-Canada Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada Border. For Reentry Information Requests turn left to access US Customs. Continue straight ahead for Canada Customs.

item.title: US-95 North - Eastport
item.description: Entering Eastport on US-95 north. Speed Limit 25 MPH.

item.title: US-95 North - Commercial Vehicles Stop At Customs
item.description: US-95 North - All Commercial Vehicles Stop At Customs approaching US-Canada boundary at Eastport.

item.title: US-95 North - Moyie River
item.description: Moyie River bridge on US-95 north in Boundary County.

item.title: US-95 North - Approaching US-Canada International Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada International Border in Boundary County.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 Split
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 split. Turn right for US-2 east to Moyie Springs and Kalispell (Montana). Continue north on US-95 for Canada.

item.title: Sand Hill Road East at US-2 and US-95 Junction
item.description: Sand Hill Road East at US-2 and US-95 Junction. Turn right for US-95 south to Bonners Ferry; left for US-95 north to Canada; straight for US-2 east to Moyie Springs.

item.title: ID-1 North - Proceed To Canada Customs
item.description: ID-1 North - Northbound traffic proceed to Canada Customs.

item.title: ID-1 North - Porthill Idaho Port of Entry
item.description: ID-1 North at Porthill Idaho Port of Entry. Merge right to continue into Canada.

item.title: ID-1 North - Border Crossing
item.description: ID-1 north approaching US Customs and Canada Customs. Turn right for the Porthill Post Office.

item.title: ID-1 North - Porthill
item.description: Entering Porthill on ID-1 north.

item.title: ID-1 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on ID-1 north at Porthill. Distance to US Customs and Canada Customs.

item.title: ID-1 North - US-Canada International Boundary
item.description: ID-1 North approaching US-Canada International Boundary at Porthill.

item.title: ID-1 North - Porthill Port of Entry Hours
item.description: Porthill Port of Entry Hours on ID-1 North. Porthill is not a 24 hour port of entry.

item.title: ID-1 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-1 north. Distance to Porthill, Creston (BC - Canada), and Kootenay Bay (BC- Canada). Kootenay Bay is the Kootenay Lake ferry terminal.

item.title: ID-1 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-1 north. Distance to Porthill. Porthill is located on the Canadian border.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-1
item.description: US-95 North approaching ID-1 in Boundary County. Use ID-1 north for the International Selkirk Loop.

item.title: US-95 North - Idaho Ports Of Entry Hours
item.description: Customs hours approaching on US-95 north approaching ID-1 junction. Porthill Port of Entry (via ID-1) open from 7 AM - 11 PM. Eastport Port of Entry (via US-95) open 24 hours.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north. Distance to Jct. SH-1, Creston (BC via ID-1), and Cranbrook (BC via US-95).

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 Split
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at US-95/US-2 split. Turn right for US-2 east to Moyie Springs and Kalispell (Montana). Continue north on US-95 for Canada.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching US-2
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching US-2. Turn right to continue east on US-2.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 North/US-2 East. Distance to Junction US-2, Moyie Springs (via US-2), and Canada (via US-95).

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Chinook St. Jct.
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East approaching Chinook St./Hospital. Continue on US-95 North/US-2 East for Moyie Springs (via US-2) and Canada (via US-95).

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East at Bus. US-95 Jct.
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at Bus. US-95 Jct. to (Bonners Ferry) City Center. Continue ahead for Moyie Springs (via US-2) and Canada (via US-95). The Kootenai River bridge is in the background of the photo.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Bonners Ferry
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at Ash St. in Bonners Ferry

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Alderson Ln
item.description: US-95 North/US-2 East at Alderson Ln. Turn right for Alderson Lake and Paradise Valley.

item.title: US-95 North/US-2 East - Bonners Ferry
item.description: Entering Bonners Ferry on US-95 North/US-2 East. Bonners Ferry is the county seat of Boundary County, Idaho which is the northernmost county in Idaho.

item.title: US-95 North - Wild Horse Trail Scenic Byway/International Selkirk Loop
item.description: Wild Horse Trail Scenic Byway and International Selkirk Loop signs on US-95 north.

item.title: US-95 at Boundary St. - Continue Ahead For Canada
item.description: US-95 approaching international boundary in Eastport. Stay on US-95 for Canada.

item.title: US-95 - U.S. Border Station, Eastport, Idaho
item.description: US-95 north at the US Border Station - Eastport, Idaho.

item.title: US-95 Leaving US Customs
item.description: US-95 shield at exit of US Customs at Port of Eastport. Turn right for US-95 and to leave US Customs facility.

item.title: US-95 North - US Border Station Parking
item.description: US-95 north at US Border Station Visitor Parking, at the US-Canada boundary in Eastport.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-Canada Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada Border. For Reentry Information Requests turn left to access US Customs. Continue straight ahead for Canada Customs.

item.title: US-95 North - Approaching US-Canada Boundary
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada International Border in Boundary County.

item.title: US-95 North At ID-1
item.description: US-95 north at ID-1. Continue north on US-95 for the Canadian Border, Port of Eastport/Port of Kingsgate crossing. Use ID-1 north for the Canadian Border, Port of Porthill/Port of Rykerts.

item.title: US-95 North - Idaho Ports Of Entry Hours
item.description: Customs hours approaching on US-95 north approaching ID-1 junction. Porthill Port of Entry (via ID-1) open from 7 AM - 11 PM. Eastport Port of Entry (via US-95) open 24 hours.

item.title: US-2 West At US-95
item.description: US-2 west at US-95. Turn right for US-95 north to Canada. Turn left for US-95 South/US-2 West to Sandpoint and Bonners Ferry.

item.title: US-2 West Approaching US-95
item.description: US-2 west approaching US-95 in Boundary County.

item.title: ID-1 South - USA-Canada Border
item.description: Welcome To The United States/US Customs, ID-1 South. This is taken right at the border gate. The post on the right side of the picture is what the border gate is attached to.

item.title: ID-1 South - Welcome To USA and Idaho
item.description: Welcome To the United States of America and Welcome TO Idaho on ID-1 South
